replies.body:
Why do Hot dogs come in packages of 10, but Hot dog Buns come in packages of 8?


Think about this one...
replies.body_tagged:
Why do Hot dogs come in packages of 10, but Hot dog Buns come in packages of 8?


Think about this one...

replies.body: Each manufacturer has its own interests. They aren't the same entity. Hot dog manufacturers prefer to have packages weigh exactly a pound. It's easier to measure, sell, store, etc.
replies.body_tagged: Each manufacturer has its own interests. They aren't the same entity. Hot dog manufacturers prefer to have packages weigh exactly a pound. It's easier to measure, sell, store, etc.
